awd_titl_txt: Intelligent Structures Group Research Experiences for       Undergraduates Site
awd_abstract_narration: This project will support 8 students during the summer                     of 1991 and 8 more students during the academic year 1991-92                    to do research in the Intelligent Structures Group within the                   Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the                        University of New Hampshire.  The research projects revolve                     around the development of new hardware structures for                           embedding intelligence in dedicated electronic systems.                         Basic research is performed in the areas of distributed                         fault-tolerance, neural networks, synthetic vision, and                         learning systems in control and signal processing.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
